text: James Peter Brokenshire (8 January 1968 – 7 October 2021) was a British politician. He was Minister of State for Security at the Home Office from 2020 to 2021. He was a member of the Conservative Party. He was part of Theresa May's Cabinet as Secretary of State for Housing, Communities and Local Government from 2018 to 2019 and Secretary of State for Northern Ireland from 2016 to 2018. Brokenshire was a Member of Parliament (MP) for Old Bexley and Sidcup from 2010 until his death. In December 2017, Brokenshire was diagnosed with early-stage lung cancer. He died from the disease on 7 October 2021 at a hospital in Dartford, England at the age of 53. ==Notes== ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website *Profile on the Conservative Party website *Guardian Unlimited Politics – Ask Aristotle: James Brokenshire MP Category:1968 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in England Category:Conservative Party (UK) MPs Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Politicians from Essex Category:UK MPs 2005–2010 Category:UK MPs 2010–2015 Category:UK MPs 2015–2017 Category:UK MPs 2017–2019 Category:UK MPs 2019–2024 Category:Secretaries of State for Northern Ireland
